Marcher Stronghold
Marcher Strongholds are formidable castles located at the southern border of The Stormlands. They were build to keep Dornish invaders out. The ruling houses of these castles have a long lasting martial tradition and are famous for their excellent longbowmen.
Marcher Strongholds are formidable castles located at the southern border of The Stormlands. They were build to keep Dornish invaders out. The ruling houses of these castles have a long lasting martial tradition and are famous for their excellent longbowmen.
A Marcher Stronghold is a stronger Fort and provides additional [ICON_FOOD] Food. Can only be build on Plains. Only the Stormlanders may build it.
Construct a [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_MARCHER_STRONGHOLD]Marcher Stronghold[\LINK]
Only The Stormlands may build it. May only be built on farms and never adjacent to another Kibbutz. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture after the discovery of Radio.
It will increase the amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food and defensive opportunities in this tile.
